ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-14T03:27:45 [Issue ID 4000-424996] urn:comicvine:4000-424996 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-12 09:05:36. [Issue ID 1140863]
ComicInfo.Summary: Lying in the snow, dying of starvation and cold, Sonja remembers as in a dream the night Ryshak slaughtered her family and her village. She recalls extracting her revenge. Her former bodyguards Ayla and Nias find her, but is it too late?
ComicInfo.Title: At the Edge of Despair
